snippet: Founded in 2010 to sell cheap phones online, the company has become the No. 3 producer worldwide behind Apple and Samsung and is looking toward Brazil and India.
abstract: Xiaomi is top smartphone maker in China, where smartphone sales are forecast to reach 500 million in 2015, and third-largest in world; four-year-old Chinese firm is looking to expand into Brazil and India.

byline.original: By PAUL MOZUR and SHANSHAN WANG
byline.contributor: Paul Mozur reported from Hong Kong and Shanshan Wang from Beijing.

lead_paragraph: Founded in 2010 to sell cheap phones online, the company has become the No. 3 producer worldwide behind Apple and Samsung and is looking toward Brazil and India.

headline.main: The Rise of a New Smartphone Giant: China’s Xiaomi
headline.print_headline: The Rise of a New Giant
